xmppList.content: I think that the key difference is scope: we can see cybersecurity as the overarching discipline that includes network security as one of its components. From my experience, I think of cybersecurity as protecting an entire house (including its contents, residents, and access points), while network security is specifically about securing the doors, windows, and passages into and within that house.
